programme.title: ONE & DONE/BEN SIMMONS
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports chronicles the sprawling journey of number one NBA draft pick Ben Simmons. From a relatively anonymous Australian upbringing to high school and college in America to the top of the rookie class in the world's foremost basketball league, ONE & DONE chronicles a pivotal period in a young man's life, capturing Simmons and his inner circle as they realize a lifelong dream in the limelight of an exclusive fraternity of top NBA draft picks

programme.title: The Parent Trap
programme.desc: Hallie Parker, a hip Californian, and Annie James, a proper London miss (both played by Lindsay Lohan) are identical twins who don't even know each other exist - until they accidentally meet at summer camp. Now they're up to their freckles in schemes and dreams to switch places, get their parents (Dennis Quaid and Natasha Richardson) back together, and have the family they've always wished for

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: A closeted gay teen wants to join the popular girls' clique, but his scheme backfires when his best friend is forced out of the closet instead. Stars Megan Mullally and Natasha Lyonne

programme.title: L Word Mississippi: Hate The Sin
programme.desc: A provocative and moving documentary that explores the lives of gay women living in the conservative, religious deep South and the unique hardships, bigotry, bullying, sexism and racism they endure. Produced by Ilene Chaiken of 'The L Word' and 'The Real L Word'

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: The Parent Trap

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her

Plus, there's Nick's scoop on how a trip to Australia was the straw that broke his marriage to Mariah Carey's back. Filmed live at the Ebony Repertory Theatre in South Central Los Angles

programme.title: Godfrey: Regular Black
programme.desc: No-holds barred stand-up comedian Godfrey performs a riotous set in his hometown of Chicago

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life

programme.title: Gravy

programme.title: Girl on the Edge

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes

Charlie Yeung costars in this stylish thriller(n)

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Sin City
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford (Breaking Bad) hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's All Star Comedy Jam franchise in Las Vegas, featuring comedy veteran Earthquake who teams up with Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb, and Donell Rawlings to deliver a hilarious night of comedy(n)

programme.title: Anarchy Parlor
programme.desc: Horror about a mysterious nomad who works at a Lithuanian tattoo parlor where he practices a dark art form passed down through the generations, giving the visiting tourists much more than they bargained for(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton(n)

programme.title: Key & Peele / Garry Marshall
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Keegan-Michael Key & Jordan Peele and Garry Marshall(n)

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans(n)

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno(n)

programme.title: Winter Passing
programme.desc: In this dramatic comedy, Zooey Deschanel stars as a struggling twenty-something actress who goes in search of her legendary, reclusive novelist father and must wrestle with his unconventional new family and their shared past. Also stars Ed Harris and Will Ferrell(n)

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton(n)

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno(n)

programme.title: Cold Creek Manor
programme.desc: Cooper Tilson (Dennis Quaid) and his wife Leah (Golden Globe winner Sharon Stone) are New Yorkers wanting to escape city life for the saner, safer countryside. They move their two children into a dilapidated old mansion filled with the possessions of the previous family. Turning it into their dream house becomes a living nightmare when the previous owner (Stephen Dorff) shows up, and a series of terrifying incidents leads them on a search for clues to the estate's dark and lurid past

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: A real-life medical phenomenon forms the basis of this gripping psychological thriller about a young man who is paralyzed on an operating table by anesthesia but totally conscious and able to feel everything his surgeon is doing. Hayden Christensen, Jessica Alba and Terrence Howard star

programme.title: Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: An engaged couple goes away with their friends to a remote cabin to celebrate their upcoming wedding but the weekend takes a horrifying turn when dark secrets and forbidden desires are revealed and what started as a celebration quickly descends into a bloody nightmare

programme.title: Would You Rather
programme.desc: After the tragic death of her parents, Iris (Brittany Snow) is desperate to make ends meet while caring for her terminally ill younger brother. Shepard Lambrick (Jeffrey Combs), a philanthropist who expresses interest in helping them, invites her to an exclusive dinner party. When she arrives, she finds herself among a group of similarly desperate individuals. They are all trapped in Lambrick's mansion and forced to play a sadistic game where only the winner will get out alive

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer. Matthew Broderick and Rupert Everett star

programme.title: Bravetown
programme.desc: After an accidental drug overdose, a hardened New York teen DJ is sentenced to spend a year with his estranged father in small town North Dakota where he discovers a community of people who need his music to lift them up

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: On distant planets, a royal messiah has been born who will restore order to the universe, but there are forces that don't want evil to be vanquished!

programme.title: Willow Creek
programme.desc: A young couple find themselves face-to-face against a terrifying evil when they venture into the remote woods of Bigfoot country to research the existence of the infamous ape

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: For two centuries, Andrew, a popular robot model, learns all he might about the intricacies of humanity, life and love, and teaches as much as he learns. Through these efforts, he shows the world how to open its eyes and its heart to receive any being with enough compassion to ask for acceptance

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. He is given a special assignment and must root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life(c)

programme.title: An Eye For Beauty
programme.desc: Luc is a brilliant young architect with a budding reputation. Opinionated, charming and confident, he lives with his beautiful wife in the stunning countryside of Quebec. Luc's seemingly perfect life begins to fall apart, however, when he meets and falls for a mysterious woman during a business trip. Caught in a triangle of emotions, he puts everything in jeopardy to pursue his affair, including the life he has built and the woman he loves

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: Lush cinematic feat of three interwoven classic Italian fairytales which feature a queen on a bitter quest, two mysterious sisters who provoke the passion of a king and a young daughter who must wrestle with her father’s obsession with a giant flea. Starring Salma Hayek and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: For two centuries, Andrew, a popular robot model, learns all he might about the intricacies of humanity, life and love, and teaches as much as he learns. Through these efforts, he shows the world how to open its eyes and its heart to receive any being with enough compassion to ask for acceptance

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress

programme.title: Splash
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as a man now reunited with the mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her not knowing who or what she is

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: The Face Of Death
programme.desc: Season 3 premiere. As Pope Alexander (Jeremy Irons) fights for his life after being poisoned, the Cardinals jockey for position to take over the Papacy. Cesare (Francois Arnaud) and Micheletto (Sean Harris) trace the assassination plot back to its source, but Della Rovere (Colm Feore) is ready to make his move. Catherina Sforza (Gina McKee) dispatches her own personal assassin, Rufio (Thure Lindhart), to dethrone the Borgias. However, thanks to Lucrezia's (Holliday Grainger) quick thinking, the family's grip on power may not be lost(n)

credits.director: Graphic Violence, Adult Content, Adult Language

programme.title: The Purge
programme.desc: Pope Alexander tasks Cardinal Sforza with initiating an inquisition among the Cardinals who were politicking against him. With the evidence he needs, Alexander dismisses and banishes all the Cardinals he does not trust. Meanwhile, Catherina Sforza orders Rufio to seek support from the mercenary warlords of the Romagna families. Lucrezia is annoyed with her in-laws to be and her situation is complicated further as she realizes her feelings for Cesare are becoming something more than sisterly(n)

credits.director: Graphic Violence, Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: In a futuristic world where society has collapsed and water is scarce, a 17-year-old girl decides to take on the henchmen of a greedy water baron, who is violently laying claim to the precious resources that are left(n)

programme.title: Raze
programme.desc: In this action-horror film, 50 women are abducted and taken to an undisclosed location where they are forced to fight to the death using their bare hands, in a ceremony as ancient as it is secret(n)

programme.title: American Graffiti
programme.desc: Coming of age classic, directed by George Lucas, following four teenagers in the early 60s on their last summer night before college, as they explore drag racing, romance, drive ins and experience America's last age of innocence. Stars Harrison Ford, Richard Dreyfuss and Ron Howard(n)

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers)(n)

programme.title: The Sting
programme.desc: A novice con man (Robert Redford) teams up with an acknowledged master (Paul Newman) to avenge the murder of a mutual friend by pulling off the ultimate big con and swindling a fortune from a mobster (Robert Shaw) in director George Roy Hill's Academy Award® winning Best Picture(n)

programme.title: The Spirit
programme.desc: A classic comics character inspired this gritty, hard-boiled thriller about a slain cop (Gabriel Macht) whose ghost returns to his hometown to defeat a corrupt, murderous villain called The Octopus (Samuel L. Jackson). Eva Mendes costars in this visually dazzling adaptation(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses
programme.desc: In this buddy drama, a Vietnam vet and his grumpy yet lovable sidekick team up to find the killer of a young boxer and clean up the streets of LA only to be drawn into an international crime ring. Stars Danny Trejo and Danny Glover(n)

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation(n)

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson stars as a cop who asserts his own code of justice, blurring the lines between right and wrong, but when he gets caught on tape beating a suspect, he finds himself caught in a downwards emotional spiral, amidst a corruption scandal. Also stars Sigourney Weaver, Robin Wright and Ice Cube(n)

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Something has gone wrong at a remote scientific research station on Mars. Sealing off the portal to Earth, Sarge (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson), Reaper (Karl Urban) and their team must use every weapon at their disposal—and some they find along the way—to carry out their orders: nothing gets out alive(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: An ex-special forces member leads a crew of corrupt police officers and former soldiers in a daring bank robbery in this classic heist thriller. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kate Winslet, Woody Harrelson and Casey Affleck(n)

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: 4/14/2017 (R)
programme.desc: The critically acclaimed SHOWTIME boxing series, "ShoBox: The New Generation" returns with a slate of undefeated prospects determined to fight for a world title, featuring light heavyweight Dmitry Bivol (9-0, 7 KOs) and welterweight Juan Ruiz (18-0, 11 KOs) in separate bouts

programme.title: 2017 Week 1
programme.desc: Emmy® Award winning INSIDE THE NFL brings you every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown for exclusive game highlights from NFL Films plus, expert analysis, in-depth features and hard-hitting commentary from NFL MVPs Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, veteran linebacker Ray Lewis and special correspondent Brandon Marshall(c)

programme.title: A Season With Navy Football: Episode 2
programme.desc: This week on A SEASON WITH NAVY FOOTBALL, go behind-the-scenes with exclusive on and off the field access to one of America's oldest service academies as Navy plays host to Tulane's Green Wave in Annapolis(c)

programme.title: Twelve Monkeys
programme.desc: The year is 2035 and humankind subsists in a desolate world following an event that eradicated 99 percent of the Earth's population, and made the planet's surface uninhabitable. In order to preserve their fate in this new world, survivors must rely on time travel as their last resort. Desperately hoping that the resources of the past might help them reclaim and rebuild the future, a group of scientists living beneath Philadelphia secure a volunteer to embark on an experimental trip back to the year 1996. Bruce Willis and Madeline Stowe star

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: An American news crew, determined to capture a voracious monster and stop his demonic rampage, travel deep within the darkest reaches of the African jungle to hunt their prey. But Gustave, as the natives call him, is also on the hunt - always on the move, always elusive, always hungry for human flesh. Inspired by the true story of a legendary 25-foot man-eating crocodile, starring Dominic Purcell and Orlando Jones

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in the men's room of a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia po­lice captain (Harrison Ford) assigned to the case discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation. He fears for his own life, and the lives of the boy and his mother and they flee to a Lancaster County farm. The detective becomes ro­mantically attached to the young mother, while she, because of her Amish upbringing, must suppress the attraction she feels for him

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: A young athlete dying in action is one of the greatest tragedies in sports. Sharyn Alfonsi looks into the debate over how such untimely deaths might be prevented. Plus, Jeff Glor reports on the craze for drone racing - and the "pilots" in virtual headsets who are having the time of their lives; Mo Rocca horses around with the pageantry and pretty people that make up the U.S. equestrian circuit; and Sharyn Alfonsi walks the course with Bubba Watson to see - and hear - what makes one of the PGA's winningest players tick

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Something has gone wrong at a remote scientific research station on Mars. Sealing off the portal to Earth, Sarge (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson), Reaper (Karl Urban) and their team must use every weapon at their disposal—and some they find along the way—to carry out their orders: nothing gets out alive

programme.title: Rampart

Also stars Sigourney Weaver, Robin Wright and Ice Cube

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: It's the 1860s, the Civil War is underway, and the country is torn apart and on the brink of chaos. For the inhabitants of Manhattan's Five Points, a war is also raging closer to home. Amsterdam Vallon (Leonardo Dicaprio), a young Irish-American immigrant, is released from prison after fifteen years. He returns to Five Points bent on revenge against Bill the Butcher (Daniel Day-Lewis), the powerful anti-immigrant gang leader who killed Amsterdam's father. Directed by Martin Scorsese

programme.title: Kill Kane
programme.desc: A family man seeks revenge when his wife and children are murdered by infamous gangsters. Taking matters into his own hands, he pursues vigilante justice on the streets, hunting down those who robbed him of a future

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: Conan (Arnold Schwarzenegger) is captured as a child after his parents' savage murder by Thulsa Doom (James Earl Jones), head of the malignant snake cult of Set. After fifteen years of fighting in the pits, he is set free by his owner and vows revenge together with his companions Subotai the Mongol (Gerry Lopez) and Valeria, Queen of Thieves (Sandahl Bergman). They set forth upon a quest to learn "the riddle of steel," which Conan's father prophesied will confer ultimate power on someone

programme.title: 2017 Week 1

programme.title: Sex and Balances
programme.desc: With his hedonistic life-style in full swing, Damon makes a risky decision to reconnect with his estranged mother(c)

programme.title: No Bullsh*t
programme.desc: Carmen is arrested just as her parents arrive in town, leaving Dice to keep them under control, while hiding each other's secrets. Dice tries to help his lawyer with an out of control personal problem(c)

programme.title: Sloth
programme.desc: A surgically implanted tongue patch that prevents users from tasting food; plus, a high-tech device for mutually masturbating with your partner without ever leaving your respective apartments. Series finale(c)

programme.title: Survival Island
programme.desc: A shipwreck at sea leaves a wealthy married couple (Billy Zane and Kelly Brook) alive with only each other and a former servant (Juan Pablo di Pace) for companionship - a situation that quickly leads to sexual jealousy and murderous intentions

programme.title: The Lair of the White Worm
programme.desc: Archaeologist Angus Flint is staying at Mercy Farm, in the heart of England's Peak district. He is the guest of Mary and Eve Trent, two sisters who were orphaned when their parents mysteriously vanished. While excavating their garden for a paper he is writing, he unearths a prehistoric skull of indeterminate age and species, and unleashes an unspeakable evil on the countryside. When the skull is stolen by nearby resident Lady Sylvia Marsh, all of their lives are caught in a threatening web of pagan terror, savage rituals and crawling horror

programme.title: 11 Blocks
programme.desc: Martial arts thriller about a man whose wife is held hostage by a corrupt police chief and a hired assassin, forcing him to do the impossible: traverse 11 gang-controlled city blocks to save her life

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon

programme.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?
programme.desc: The outrageously funny stand up Sebastian Maniscalco stars in this comedy special, blending his high energy physicality and his inimitable facial expressions to send up modern life through the lens of his old-world, Italian-American upbringing

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Two brothers (Chris Pine and Ben Foster) come together to rob a bank that is foreclosing on their family land. Vengeance seems to be theirs until they find themselves in the crosshairs of a foul-mouthed Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) looking for one last triumph on the eve of his retirement. As the brothers plot one final heist, a showdown looms at the crossroads where the last honest law man and a pair of brothers with nothing to live for except family collide

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton

programme.title: The Yards
programme.desc: Released from prison after taking the fall for a group of his friends, Leo Handler (Mark Wahlberg) just wants to get his life on track. But when he takes a job with his powerfully influential Uncle Frank (James Caan) and reconnects with his old friend Willie (Joaquin Phoenix), Leo finds himself unwittingly drawn into a world of sabotage, high-stakes payoffs and murder. Featuring Charlize Theron, Faye Dunaway and Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: When the seaside community of Amity finds itself under attack by a dangerous great white shark, the town's chief of police (Roy Scheider), a young marine biologist (Richard Dreyfuss) and a grizzled shark hunter (Robert Shaw) embark on a desperate quest to destroy the beast before it strikes again

programme.title: Shabbos Goy
programme.desc: Ray's therapy is at odds with the high-stakes power struggle between Sam and her opponents. Mickey - at Frank's behest - seeks out an old friend of the Donovan's. Meanwhile, Terry takes Damon to New York to train for a fight; Bunchy is confronted by sins from the Donovan past; and Bridget tries to reconcile with Smitty - until a major crisis forces them together(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass
programme.desc: A shunned Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime(n)

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: When a rising star in the global tech company makes an innocent mistake, he must become a corporate spy to obtain trade secrets from a rival company. But what starts as a clever ruse becomes a life-and-death game of corporate espionage. Stars Liam Hemsworth, Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman(n)

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: Armen Keteyian reports on the hugely popular fantasy sports contests that more and more legal authorities are calling gambling. Superstar quarterback Cam Newton shows a different side in an interview with James Brown. Plus, Charlie Rose probes how a spirited on- and off-track rivalry between three-time world champion Lewis Hamilton and teammate Nico Rosberg contributes to the success of a well-oiled Formula One team. And Anderson Cooper follows Alpine daredevil JT Holmes as he attempts to teach some of his extreme skills to others(n)

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: Jon Wertheim looks into the Jackson Wink MMA Academy in Albuquerque, NM, training ground for some of the best MMA fighters in the world. Armen Keteyian examines a change in NCAA enforcement that has some elite coaches under the gun for the behavior of their teams. Plus, a profile of Scott Cochran, the Alabama Crimson Tide strength coach, whose contract was re-upped at a salary as high as some head coaches' - and the 75th Anniversary of the U.S. Naval Academy's Brigade Boxing Championships(n)

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe(n)

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers(n)

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer(n)

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Two young, passionate magicians are friends and partners until one fateful night when their biggest trick goes terribly wrong. Now the bitterest of enemies, they will stop at nothing - including deceit and sabotage - to learn each other's secrets. Their obsessive rivalry takes over their lives, and not everything is what it seems. Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine and Scarlett Johansson star(n)

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey(n)

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe(n)

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
programme.desc: Academy Award nominee Johnny Depp stars as a man who returns to London after escaping from 15 years of false imprisonment in Australia, and adopts the guise of Sweeny Todd. He vows to kill the evil Judge Turpin (Alan Rickman) and his henchman Beadle Bamford (Timothy Spall), who shipped him off to the other side of the world in order to steal his wife and daughter from him. Sweeney has only revenge on his mind, and sets himself up in his old barber shop above Mrs. Lovett's pie store. Directed by Tim Burton(n)

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
programme.desc: When Miley Stewart (aka pop-star Hannah Montana) gets too caught up in the superstar celebrity lifestyle, her dad decides it's time for a change of scenery: Miley must trade-in the glitz and glamour of Hollywood and return to the family farm in Tennessee to face the most important decision of her life - with a little help from her friends & guest stars Taylor Swift, Rascal Flatts and Vanessa Williams: can she be both Miley Stewart and Hannah Montana?

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer. Matthew Broderick and Rupert Everett star

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the Frog - along with Fozzie Bear, Miss Piggy, Gonzo and a motley crew of Muppets - embarks on a cross-country trip to find fame in Hollywood while eluding the grasp of a relentless frog-leg restauranteur

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

programme.title: Inspector Gadget

When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with

programme.desc: Mick Dundee (Paul Hogan) is back in this sequel that finds the famed crocodile hunter relocating with his lady love Sue (Linda Kozlowski) and their son to the urban jungle of Los Angeles, where Sue takes over her father's newspaper while Mick and his boy are soon up to their necks in trouble investigating a mystery. Paul Rodriguez costars in this warmly funny follow-up

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance

programme.title: Finding Vivian Maier
programme.desc: Documentary about mysterious nanny Vivian Maier, who secretly took over 100,000 photographs that were hidden in storage lockers to be discovered decades later, and is now considered among the 20th century's greatest photographers. Her strange and riveting life and art is revealed through never before seen photographs, films, and interviews with dozens who thought they knew her

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

Legendary action stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li finally unite for this fun-filled adventure(n)

programme.title: The Sting
programme.desc: A novice con man (Robert Redford) teams up with an acknowledged master (Paul Newman) to avenge the murder of a mutual friend by pulling off the ultimate big con and swindling a fortune from a mobster (Robert Shaw) in director George Roy Hill's Academy Award® winning Best Picture(n)

programme.title: The Face of Love
programme.desc: Five years after the death of her beloved husband, a woman meets a man who seems to be his exact replica. As she falls for this stranger, she can't bring herself to tell him the truth about what attracted her but the it must come out. Stars Annette Bening, Ed Harris and Robin Williams(n)

programme.title: Helicopter Mom
programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay(n)

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication(n)

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn(n)

programme.title: Three Men And A Baby
programme.desc: Three handsome Manhattan bachelors find their dating and mating rituals irreparably altered when a baby, the lovechild of one of the men, shows up on their doorstep. Stars Tom Selleck, Steve Guttenberg and Ted Danson(n)

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect(n)

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn(n)

programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis

programme.title: Scorned
programme.desc: When a woman discovers her boyfriend is cheating on her with her best friend, she plans a romantic weekend getaway for just the three of them, complete with terror, torture and twisted psychosexual games. Stars AnnaLynne McCord and Billy Zane

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. But as her health begins to fail and she becomes increasing jealous of his fiancée, he is forced to confront his co-dependent sibling relationship and the threat it is posing to his engagement

programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins

programme.title: Heartbreakers (2001)
programme.desc: Experts at seducing and fleecing wealthy men, mother-daughter grifters Sigourney Weaver and Jennifer Love Hewitt arrive in Palm Beach, Florida, where they target an aging tobacco baron (Gene Hackman) and the owner (Jason Lee) of a beachside tavern. Ray Liotta, Anne Bancroft and Nora Dunn costar in this comedy from the writer of "Liar Liar."

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel

programme.title: Heartbreakers (2001)
programme.desc: Experts at seducing and fleecing wealthy men, mother-daughter grifters Sigourney Weaver and Jennifer Love Hewitt arrive in Palm Beach, Florida, where they target an aging tobacco baron (Gene Hackman) and the owner (Jason Lee) of a beachside tavern. Ray Liotta, Anne Bancroft and Nora Dunn costar in this comedy from the writer of "Liar Liar."

programme.title: Dr. Hattaras' Miracle Elixir
programme.desc: Tara tries to drop her Abnormal Psychology class but instead receives an intriguing pitch from her instructor, Dr. Hattaras; Charmaine and Neil find parenthood a struggle but still refuse Tara's help; Max finds himself at odds with his boss at his new job; Kate prepares for flight attendant training; Lionel catches Marshall with Noah, jeopardizing their student film project(c)

programme.title: The Road To Hell Is Paved With Breast Intentions
programme.desc: Tara seems to be making progress with her new contract but Dr. Hattaras discovers something disturbing in a tape from one her therapy sessions; much to the sisters' chagrin, Neil invites Tara and Charmaine's mother to visit her grandchild; Max is unhappy at his new job but can't talk to Tara about it; Kate is surprised when a handsome flyer rebuffs her flirting(c)

programme.title: The Electrifying & Magnanimous Return Of Beaverlamp
programme.desc: Max is delighted by Tara's suggestion that he reunite his rock band, Beaverlamp; Tara is turned away from further sessions by a strangely depressed Dr. Hattaras; Kate connects with frequent flyer Evan; Marshall and Noah stage a tense, revealing interview with Max for their film festival project(c)

programme.title: Chicken 'n' Corn
programme.desc: A scare at a local corn maze leaves Tara shaken, and she later reveals a new alter that threatens Charmaine's baby and shows up at Dr. Hattaras' office as Alice, renewing his interest in her case; Kate escorts Max and Marshall to New York, where she introduces them to Evan and his unruly son; Charmaine meets a "fierce mommy" at a spa(c)

programme.title: Raze
programme.desc: In this action-horror film, 50 women are abducted and taken to an undisclosed location where they are forced to fight to the death using their bare hands, in a ceremony as ancient as it is secret

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage

Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse

programme.title: More Than T
programme.desc: Beyond the headlines and debates about gender rights witness the multidimensional lives of seven transgender and gender nonconforming individuals as told through the lens of celebrated filmmaker Silas Howard (‘Transparent')

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny Farrell has led an openly gay life with everyone except her family. She has kept it a secret out of compassion for her parents, knowing they are happiest living in a small, safe and familiar world. Realizing she is missing out on having a full life, Jenny decides to marry Kitty, a woman they thought was her roommate. Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. Misunderstanding leads to misunderstanding, and long-standing grudges are revealed

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: From Darren Lynn Bousman, the director of SAW II, III and IV, MOTHER'S DAY is a graphic remake of the horror classic. After a bank robbery gone wrong, three brothers go home to hide out, only to discover that their mother (Rebecca De Mornay) lost their house in a foreclosure. The new owners become the depraved brothers' unwitting hostages. Their sadistic mother soon arrives and brilliantly takes control of the situation, ratcheting up the terror

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change(n)

programme.title: Winter Passing
programme.desc: In this dramatic comedy, Zooey Deschanel stars as a struggling twenty-something actress who goes in search of her legendary, reclusive novelist father and must wrestle with his unconventional new family and their shared past. Also stars Ed Harris and Will Ferrell(n)

programme.title: An Eye For Beauty
programme.desc: Luc is a brilliant young architect with a budding reputation. Opinionated, charming and confident, he lives with his beautiful wife in the stunning countryside of Quebec. Luc's seemingly perfect life begins to fall apart, however, when he meets and falls for a mysterious woman during a business trip. Caught in a triangle of emotions, he puts everything in jeopardy to pursue his affair, including the life he has built and the woman he loves(n)

programme.title: Margaret Cho: psyCHO
programme.desc: Three-time Grammy® and Emmy® nominated comedian Margaret Cho performs in front of a live audience in this provocative and hilarious comedy special event, tackling off-limits issues from Boko Haram to female empowerment with her razor sharp insight and wit(n)

programme.title: Gravy
programme.desc: Comic horror flick about a group of employees in a Mexican Cantina who are terrorized by a trio of cannibals, who lock the staff in the restaurant and go on a Halloween night killing spree. Stars Sutton Foster(n)

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Split Persona
programme.desc: The bond between twin sisters starts to fray when their mother starts showing signs of suicidal depression. Still, they need each other - but have they grown too far apart? Directed by Bradley Rust Gray. Written by Mayraleeh Nelson(n)

programme.title: Finding Vivian Maier
programme.desc: Documentary about mysterious nanny Vivian Maier, who secretly took over 100,000 photographs that were hidden in storage lockers to be discovered decades later, and is now considered among the 20th century's greatest photographers. Her strange and riveting life and art is revealed through never before seen photographs, films, and interviews with dozens who thought they knew her(n)

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope(n)

programme.title: After Words
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Marcia Gay Harden stars as a librarian who travels to Costa Rica to escape her mid-life crisis and finds herself on an unexpected journey filled with adventure and romance(n)

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum)(n)

programme.title: The Parent Trap

programme.desc: When a space station crew refuses to return home, Dr. Chris Kelvin is sent to find out what's going on. When he arrives, most of crew has disappeared, and Chris is visited by a replica of his late wife who is imbued with her memories. Remake of the acclaimed 1972 film and adapted from Stanislaw Lem's novel. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: American Psycho
programme.desc: A rich Wall Street player (Christian Bale) basks in his late-1980s yuppie lifestyle, but behind his slick appearance lurks a murderous monster. Jared Leto, Willem Dafoe, Samantha Mathis, Chloe Sevigny, Reese Witherspoon, Josh Lucas. Contains extra footage not shown in theaters. Mary Harron directed the adaptation of Bret Easton Ellis's controversial novel. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Julian is a stylish and successful male prostitute whose life goes downhill when he's framed for murder after doing a pimp a favor. The only person he can trust is a politician's wife who is frustrated with her husband, and is the only woman he sleeps with who doesn't pay for his services. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Animals.
programme.desc: The squirrels' wild journey after the collapse of their home ends; a queen ant tries to make friends by going undercover as a worker. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Dim Sum Funeral
programme.desc: After their mother passes away, four estranged siblings return home to attend the traditional funeral she wanted. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Two inept pals become embroiled in a kidnapping plot when they try to return a briefcase to a lovely woman, who left it in an airport...on purpose. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood Men in Tights

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: A rakish bachelor learns to grow up after befriending an awkward lad. The chemistry between the actors drives this emotionally rich comedy-drama. The film was adapted from a Nick Hornby novel ("High Fidelity"). (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Joneses
programme.desc: An ordinary suburban couple discover that their hospitable new neighbors are actually government spies. Soon, all four of them are caught up in an international espionage imbroglio. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Now fully recovered from his amnesia, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne attempts to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich

programme.title: Observe and Report
programme.desc: A mentally unstable mall cop competes with a seasoned detective to catch an elusive flasher in this dark comedy starring Seth Rogen. Meanwhile, as Ronnie attempts to earn a spot at the police academy and impress pretty makeup-counter girl Brandi (Anna Faris), scheming Detective Harrison (Ray Liotta) does his best to humiliate the put-upon rent-a-cop with a series of cruel pranks. programme.title: The Nice Guys

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Max must make a tough choice about his allegiance when Phoebe's ascension is threatened by the Villain League, who also plan to destroy the Thundermans. (repeat)

programme.title: Full House
programme.desc: A client (Jeannie Wilson) makes Jesse (John Stamos) the model for a cologne ad, but he thinks it stinks when she demands too much of his bare essence on-screen. Mr. Malatesta: James Hampton. Rebecca: Lori Loughlin. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Full House
programme.desc: A mother-daughter slumber party awakens feelings of loss in Stephanie (Jodie Sweetin), even though her stand-in mom is anything but a snooze. Chris: Mary Ann Pascal. Lisa: Annie Barker. Melissa: Mayah McCoy. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Full House
programme.desc: Named editor of the school newspaper, D.J. plays favorites and appoints Kimmy editor of the sports page. Jake: Christian Guzek. Kimmy: Andrea Barber. D.J.: Candace Cameron. Jesse: John Stamos. Rebecca: Lori Loughlin. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Full House
programme.desc: Jesse gives Michelle a bad lesson in human relations when he teaches her to retaliate against the class bully (Miko Hughes). Mrs. Manning: Rosanne Katon. Michelle: Mary Kate, Ashley Olsen. Jesse: John Stamos. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Ross and Monica's Cousin
programme.desc: A visiting Geller relative (Denise Richards) has the guys longing, as Rachel and Phoebe try to plan Monica's bridal shower on very short notice. Meanwhile, Joey's big film break comes down to a nude scene that showcases an asset he no longer has. Estelle: June Gable. Jake: Troy Norton. Fred: Fred Stoller. Chandler: Matthew Perry. (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Rachel's Big Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel's reunited with an old sorority sister (Winona Ryder) who has a hard time recalling their secret smooch back in college; Chandler has an even tougher time picking out a wedding tux after he learns that Ross has found one worn by Batman. Ross: David Schwimmer. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow. (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler's frantic race to figure out the perfect wedding vows leads to a series of nostalgic clips from episodes past, encapsulating their relationship. Chandler: Matthew Perry. Ross: David Schwimmer. Monica: Courteney Cox Arquette. (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica drags Chandler to see his much mentioned, but never-before-seen, cross-dressing dad (Kathleen Turner) in his Vegas cabaret act; Ross rides shotgun for Rachel's less-than-joyful joyride in Monica's Porsche; Joey discovers the pleasure of wearing women's underwear. Jake: Troy Norton. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: On TV, Hilary subs for Kathie Lee Gifford but doesn't see eye-to-eye with Regis Philbin. Meanwhile, Will gets buddy-buddy with Philip on the golf course. Mercer: Jim Jansen. Bobby: Gibson Frazier. Hilary: Karyn Parsons. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: William Shatner stars as Hilary's talk-show guest---but Will must find a way to beam him from the dentist to the set. Meanwhile, Hilary's show is trekking to New York. West: Steve Ireland. Hilary: Karyn Parsons. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: Sandra Bullock returns as “Accident” Amy, who used to go with Benny's fiancé, Randy--- and wants to again. Randy: Nick Offerman. Gina: Elmarie Wendel. Jack: Jack Blessing. Benny: Belita Moreno. Ernie: Valente Rodriguez. Angie: Constance Marie. (repeat)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: After a tantrum at work and a slug at a teasing co-worker, the recently dumped Benny is the top suspect when the factory is vandalized. Zack: Trevor Wright. Mel: Mark Tymchyshyn. Big Bob: Harley Zumbrum. Gina: Elmarie Wendel. Benny: Belita Moreno. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Angie: Constance Marie. (repeat)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: After dumping bad-boy Zack, Carmen quickly finds a new boyfriend, but George just as quickly finds a problem with the boy. Noah: Johnny Pacar. Zack: Trevor Wright. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Benny: Belita Moreno. Angie: Constance Marie. (repeat)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: Now George Noah Ex-Zack-Ly What Happened
programme.desc: George gives Carmen an ultimatum regarding Zack; Randy tries to win back Benny with help from the Commodores. Zack: Trevor Wright. Mel: Mark Tymchyshyn. Randy: Nick Offerman. Officer: Steven Montfort. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Benny: Belita Moreno. Angie: Constance Marie. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: George Searches for a Needle in a Haight-Stack
programme.desc: Chingy and Carrot Top appear as George gets a lead on Carmen's location from the guy who took her there. Zack: Trevor Wright. Vic: Emiliano Diez. Mel: Mark Tymchyshyn. Bouncer: Marcus Brown. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Benny: Belita Moreno. Max: Luis Armand Garcia. (repeat)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: Carmen's insistence on being treated like an adult prompts George to charge her rent. So she takes in a roommate. Taylor: Valeria Andrews. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Angie: Constance Marie. Max: Luis Armand Garcia. (repeat)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: After forgetting their anniversary, George wants to buy Angie a ring he couldn't afford before, but the one she chooses is still beyond his means. Salesman: Ian Gomez. Vic: Emiliano Diez. Angie: Constance Marie. Benny: Belita Moreno. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: Angie decides to home school Carmen after her private school rejects her and Angie's employer goes under. Janet: Kaitlin Olson. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Angie: Constance Marie. Ernie: Valente Rodriguez. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.sub-title: The Snowball Effect; One Krab's Trash
programme.desc: A snowy day brings SpongeBob out to play, but Squid is reluctant to join in the fun. Later, Mr. Krabs foolishly sells a novelty hat worth millions. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.sub-title: Krusty Towers; Mrs. Puff, You're Fired
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs comes to regret his decision to transform the Krusty Krab into a fancy hotel where the “customer is king” after Squidward checks in as a very demanding guest. programme.title: The Furchester Hotel
programme.desc: Funella is very excited because it's time for the Furchester family dinner! Everyone will be heading to the dining room as soon as they've helped their guests. Mr Pickwood the beaver needs to know where some wood is, Captain Metimbers the pirate needs showing to her room and so does Matty the little mouse. With all this activity, Harvey P Dull wants to know who will look after the front desk if all the Furchesters are having a family dinner and with that Funella has moved his favourite chair in front of the desk and thanks him for helping out! The family all finally sit down for dinner, but when Furgus takes a seat he falls over. Mr Pickwood has eaten his chair! Furgus takes him to the garden and shows him the wood he CAN eat. Then Captain Metimbers interrupts, she's locked out of her treasure chest and needs Phoebe to open it. Next, Matty arrives and wants Elmo to get the bubble bath off the shelf for him as Elmo is so tall and he's so small. Then Funella hears Harvey P Dull welcoming someone WITHOUT furry arms. Funella puts some fur on Harvey's arms and shows him how to welcome guests properly. But now everyone is so busy that they can't have their family meal, it's a catastrophe! The Furchesters put their furry heads together and think, how can they have their family meal and not be interrupted by their guests? Fuzzawubba! Phoebe has a monster idea, why don't they invite their guests to dinner, after all everyone in the Furchester is like family!
